name: dihydromonacolin L acid,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (3-hydroxylating)
definition: Dihydromonacolin L acid + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> 3alpha-Hydroxy-3,5-dihydromonacolin L acid + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the first step of two-step reaction (see R10793, R10791+R10792)
